segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and that stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless he’s being, climbing up like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed out, and he’s not even holding on to anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he’s ever fallen before, because this seems like a bad idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching, like she’s cheering him on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to get into trouble if that woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t hurt himself before he gets that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR
